main event: A report detailing UFO sightings at Fort Jackson, South Carolina on March 8, 1966, during which a military trainee observed an unexplained object near a gunnery range.
interesting points: The report indicates multiple sightings of an oval object approximately three meters in diameter with glowing lights., The sightings occurred at 0030Z and 1130Z with a report of movement towards a truck., A responsible sergeant of the guard confirmed seeing the object along with several trainees., The first sighting coincided with the presence of two USAF RF-4C aircraft in the area., Local TV stations in Charlotte, NC received multiple reports of UFO sightings in the nearby areas around the same time.
sighted object: oval object approximately three meters in diameter with glowing lights
witness description: military trainees and a responsible sergeant of the guard
